reqs:
This is a core course for a Minor in Education - Early Childhood Education and the Enhancing Early Learning Certificate.
This course should be taken at the beginning of the IDSC Certificate Program.
This is an elective for the Diploma in Education - Early Years Education.
Wait lists are not offered.
courseName: Early Learning Curriculum in the Pre-School Years
description: The development of pre-kindergarten programs with reference to recent research, theories of early learning, and curriculum trends and practices.
